text: Dasāhaparamaṃ atirekapatto dhāretabbo taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ
edit: Dasāhaparamaṃ atirekapatto dhāretabbo taṃ atikkāmayato nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: 21. An extra alms bowl may be kept ten days at most. Beyond that, it is to be forfeited and confessed.
๒๑. พึงทรงอติเรกบาตรไว้ได้ ๑๐ วันเป็นอย่างยิ่ง ภิกษุให้ล่วงกำหนดนั้นไปเป็นนิสสัคคิยปาจิตตีย์
21. An extra bowl can be kept for ten days at most. If that is exceeded, it entails expiation with forfeiture.
